Articles.Content:
Hi Kerbals,

i'm loving Satelites! I am loving satelites which are circulating Kerbin, and do something usefull. (generating science.. or something other funny stuff like RemoteTech)

I found RT2 and ScanSAT and I'm searching for antother type of equipment which could be brought into orbit and do "something" (Scanning, Mapping, Blinking, Transmitting, Observating.. etc etc).

Which Mods (except Kethane and Interstellar) could be used, which generating data? (and science)

Try this maybe.

Hubble-esque orbital telescope by rubberducky. lot of fun eva's to service it too.

He's also worked in science gains for images of other bodies that you take. Its quite involved and awesome fun.
